name: Lupenio
overview: Welcome to the magical and criminal atmosphere of Lupenio. In this game, Lupenio the greatest thief of all time decides to realize his dream: to steal the wonderful diamond of King Solomon, hidden in a room of an ancient house full of dangerous guardians and deadly traps. Be careful my friend and remember... every key opens one and only one door so pay attention and try to find the right strategy. Published in New Special Playgames N°09 (Maggio 1988) supplement: Games Commodore 64 N°1.
